A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While it fails to capture the same \"feel\" that The Force Awakens did\, I still found The Last Jedi to be an overall enjoyable ride. There are a few things that I didn't like\, and a few things that left me scratching my head\, but there were also plenty of moments that left me awestruck. In the end\, I had a good time watching the film\, and I think that is what matters most. I'm eager to see how they close out the trilogy.
